mapper.sql: emp_id, emp_name, sex, id_code, birthday, join_date, status, education, degree, major, graduate_school, education_form, department_id
mapper.select: select e.emp_id, e.emp_name, e.sex, e.id_code, e.birthday, e.join_date, e.status, e.education, e.degree, e.major, e.graduate_school, e.education_form, d.department_id, d.department_name, d.note from employee e left join department d on e.department_id = d.department_id

select e.emp_id, e.emp_name, e.sex, e.id_code, e.birthday, e.join_date, e.status, e.education, e.degree, e.major, e.graduate_school, e.education_form, d.department_id, d.department_name, d.note from employee e left join department d on e.department_id = d.department_id where e.emp_id like CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')

select e.emp_id, e.emp_name, e.sex, e.id_code, e.birthday, e.join_date, e.status, e.education, e.degree, e.major, e.graduate_school, e.education_form, d.department_id, d.department_name, d.note from employee e left join department d on e.department_id = d.department_id where e.emp_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
